channel.title: Poll: Ideas for my Created Game-mode
channel.description:
Currently, While re-doing my War of the Tribes game mode, I have stumbled across some Ideas. I currently want to know what you guys think of them.
Converted Neutrals: Will include all neutrals, including Neutral Killing. [poll name=Converted Neutrals type=regular public=true] * Yes * Yes, but take away the ability for Neutral Killing to be Converted * No [/poll]
Different King Types: Including different kings for all Neutral Killing who step up. [poll name=King Types type=regular public=true] * Yes * Yes, but Just have Psychopathic King be available for Neutrals * No [/poll]

item.title: Poll: Ideas for my Created Game-mode
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
forgot to add this as wellâ€¦

Want Inquisitor to be Convertible? since you guys voted no on NK, what about Inquisitor?

  • Yes
  • No

item.title: Poll: Ideas for my Created Game-mode

item.description:
Currently, While re-doing my War of the Tribes game mode, I have stumbled across some Ideas. I currently want to know what you guys think of them.

Converted Neutrals:
Will include all neutrals, including Neutral Killing.
